timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: What's the benefit to making the names that long?
replies.author: LoganDark

replies.bodyText:
These are probably static final so captialized. Also BACKGROUND is much more explicit than BG
Also this is the color of the background?
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText:
@i509VCB It's the Mojang Studios brand color (the background of the splash screen). Maybe it should just be called BRAND_[A]RGB instead?
Edit: And yes, they are static final
replies.author: LoganDark
